11.content: Which Mass Effect game is it?
11.title: Mass Effect

1121.content: Is Shepard shrunk by another character, or does he simply awake smaller?
1121.title: Male Shepard

11211.content:
Now the question of who he is shrunk by, that will inevitable lead into a chain of other scenarios.

But this is Mass Effect 2, the cast of potential characters is smaller than ME3. And we won't feel guilty screwing around with shrinking while the reapers are killing millions by the day.
11211.title: Shrunk by...

choices: Could just clear the engine room again. (Renagade)
112111.content:
Shepard was restless in the days following the destruction of the Collector base. The Illusive Man was the least of his concerns. It felt strange, not having a goal after putting so much effort towards the Collectors.

He often found himself wandering the ship and talking to his crew. Especially Miranda, considering their encounter in the engine room prior to the assault on the Collector base. The door to Miranda’s office opened in front of him and Miranda looked up from his desk and smiled at him. “Good afternoon Shepard.” She said, taking her hands away from her keyboard.

“Hey Miranda, just trying to get a sense of where the crew is at. Thoughts?” Shepard said, crossing his arms as the door closed behind him.

Miranda laughed softly. “You would think that after sticking it to the Illusive man and quitting Cerberus I would be a lot more restless. But I feel fine. The lack of work is a bit troubling though.” She said, glancing down at her keyboard.

“I’m sure that you’ll find something to take up your time.” Shepard responded reassuringly.

“Well, maybe you could help me with that Commander.” She said, standing up and moving to the side of her desk.

“Really, and how’s that?” Shepard responded, giving Miranda the cue to elaborate.

“I’ve been thinking that we should expand on our relationship a bit…” Miranda said, locking her eyes on Shepard to see how he responds.
112111.title: Miranda Lawson

choices: There wasn't enough material for a full restoration
1122.content:
So why does Shepard shrink?

1)When her body was brought in for Project Lazarus there wasn't enough viable/useable material still on her body to be restored, therefore they came up with something well outside the box: use what materials they had as well as the tech they'd planned to use repairing Shepard to make a smaller body, then essentially download her brain into her new body when they were done. This change of plans also meant Miranda never even considers the 'brain chip' as she assumes she could easily control a girl she could hold in her hands.
2)Shepard is whammied by a Collector weapon, whether it's during a battle or due to a malfunction when they bring it back to the Normandy the end result is the same
3)Anything else
1122.title: Female Shepard

11221.content:
The last thing that Shepard remembered before she blacked out was the cold vacuum and the depressurization of her suit. Now she was awake on large clothed metal surface and was in a patient gown. It seemed a little big on her, but she didn't mind. It was soft and warm, just the way she liked it.
"Glad to see that you're awake, Commander Shepard," said a mysterious but sexy voice as a massive shadow moved in front of her.
"Who's there?" Called Shepard as she squinted at the massive shadow as it got closer and and soon began to cover her. She then saw a beautiful and giant face of a very attractive and curvy woman. While she was scanning the giantesses body, she couldn't help but blush as she gazed into the nearly endless abyss of her cleavage. If she had to guess she would have to be at least an inch tall and was both intimidated and a little turned on by this situation. You have had thoughts about this with other past relationships, but never got to go through with it until now.
"My name is Miranda Lawson, and I will be your liaison with Cerberus. I know you have questions so let me get the big ones out of the way. Cerberus has used a lot of money and resources to bring you back from death. They weren't able to get enough usable biological material, however, but we were able to bring you back at a great sacrifice to your size, unfortunately. There are some upsides to this though, as we have greatly increased your density, thus making you nearly indestructible, to the point it would take more then being repeatedly crushed by a mech to hurt you, let alone to kill you. The reason we brought you back was that we needed your help with stopping the reaper threat before it even happens. All you need to do is offer advice when we need it, and to talk to the crew if they have any requests or need to be convinced to do more for the team.
Need any other information or will that be it?" Miranda ends and looks at Shepard expectantly.
"Where will I be quartered?" She asked looking at Miranda's face.
"Don't worry you will have free reign of the ship, but you will be sleeping with a specialized crew member each night. Now come along," she says as she picks her up and carries to the Normandy. Shepard can't wait to get a tour of this new ship, but does it get to happen or does she meet the crew first?
(You can use females from the series to compensate for the male members of the crew if you want. Like Nyreen instead of Garrus, or something like that.)
11221.title: There wasn't enough material for a full res...

choices: Meeting the others (Liara, Traynor, Nyreen etc)
112212.content:
Miranda and Shepard had just barely managed to enter the main deck of the new Normandy when the Cerberus agent was approached by a chipper red head, well she normally was chipper and she sure perked up when Miranda showed up 'Finally, you have no idea how much stress she has been, I just got her to stop pacing 5 minutes ago after almost an hour! Now she's waiting in her quarters, but seriously did you take the long way on purpose? She's been at it since you sent the Shepard's awake message' the red head asked looking the closest to irritated Miranda had ever seen her 'I had recommended a sedative for the last 34 and a half minutes, it was ignored' a synthetic voice was heard over the speakers and coming from the pilot's sector 'Thanks EDI, but with everything that's happened between our species trying to put her under would have gotten me shot' Kelly replied to the pilot, no answer being returned.

'It makes sense when you think about it, we did practically kidnap her' Shepard gapped at the casual way Miranda said that, though was partly amused why how violently Kelly's flinch at the word had been 'That's a little harsh a word for the circumstances, we partly manipulated her with the fact we were bringing back her former lover and continuing her work in combating the Reapers, as well as the fact assisting us either in her memory or because she would eventually be joining us would be a good idea... plus we needed an engineer and she was the best even the Illusive Man's resources could find' Kelly zigzagged her words and to Shepard it actually sounded worse... except it meant she knew exactly who the other red head was referring to, Tali the plucky Quarian with the enormous (especially now) crush on her that especially right now she was glad had been reciprocated, she'd played Fire Emblem and didn't need her own Tharja, especially when that would mean her stalker would be larger than a Dreadnaught would have been previously, probably with an ass that could crush a Mako.

'So are you going to bring her down?' Kelly asked with a hopeful smile to which Miranda sighed 'I don't know, on the one hand if I do I may not get her back for quite a while. But on the other if I wait too long we'll try her already Cerberus thinned patience and we may at best loose our engineer' 'You could try asking me' Shepard said, some of the tech built into her regeneration making her able to be heard by the humans 'Oh there she is, she's so cute! Hi I'm Kelly Chambers and I think we're going to be great friends' Kelly chirped reaching out to hold her but missing when Miranda stepped back 'I suppose it is the best option. So Shepard, are you up for a reunion or would you prefer we get the rest of the introductions done and then I can give you and your 'friend' all the time you need?' the Australian asked after turning her head to properly look at the tiny woman on her shoulder.

So?
112212.title: Meeting the crew... soon?

choices: Tali and Miranda introduce Shepard to the others
1122121.content:
Shepard considered the 2 options... for a few seconds before her mind wandered to what a reunion with Tali would be like: the purple covered cutie would be bouncing around in excitement before unclipping her mask, revealing her lavender skin, large silver eyes and long black tongue to her alone, said tongue now rapping itself around her body, it's tip filling her before the entire muscle shoots back pulling into the gaping maw... Shepard caught herself, only now, sure she'd had these thoughts and fantasies before, about multiple women over the years but this was the first time they'd had any possibility of becoming reality, and she was probably being generous with fantasy Jane's height relative to her beloved Quarian. But she did have a mission to think of too not just her own (currently pulsing) libido, though on saying that it had probably been quite a while since Tali had seen her, though Miranda hadn't exactly been specific on such details.

'How long was I dead?' Shepard asked 'approximately 2 years' Miranda answered and that helped Shepard make up her mind: 2 years apart, she was struggling with the 3 months they'd been apart before her death 'I want to see Tali' Shepard decided Miranda rolled her eyes but nodded before heading to the elevator.
The trip itself was short (someone finally fixed the elevators) though the waiting by the door took a couple of minutes before the green light blinked and they were allowed in, immediately slamming shut the moment Miranda's behind was clear, Shepard already knowing it was due to the decontamination protocols in the 'clean room' they'd set up for Tali as a gift for her agreeing to work with them, an area where she could be free of her suit if she so wished. Scanning the room Shepard found a Quarian but was unsure if it was even Tali: the pale indigo shawl with ornate silver designs were nothing like the amethyst or black envirosuits she was accustomed to seeing the girl in, as well as the fact she appeared to be calmly working on her Omni-tool, not the hyperactive bundle of energy Shepard had come to know and love.

'Ms Zorah, Shepard wants to see you now' Miranda stated formally, the Quarian appearing to take a moment to comprehend what was said before yelling 'Jane!' and hopping out of her seat to face them, the accented voice removing any doubt from Shepard's mind but this new angle showed her their 2 years apart did wonders for her young lover/girlfriend: she had absolutely no way of knowing what Miranda's bust size was but she could tell that Tali's was actually quite close if not just as large, which considering they were mid C's like her own when they'd last met was rather impressive, plus she could see part of Tali's ass from the front, meaning the Quarian's best asset had just continued to get bigger and rounder, oh they were going to have so much fun together.

'Hi Tali, I missed you' Shepard said shyly, surprised to be picked up by the happy Quarian, gently running a finger along her hair and then down her back 'Oh Shepard it's been much too long, I've finally got you back and I'm not letting you go ever again' Tali cooed as the tiny human rubbing back against her finger, both sides wishing it were skin to skin but this would have to do. They were in their own little world until Miranda coughed to get their attention 'Well this is nice but we need to get back to showing Shepard around the Normandy and introduce her to the rest of the crew' the woman tries to take her back but Tali practically jumps away from her 'Nope, mine' Tali yells, accidentally crushing Shepard against her breasts, Miranda rolls her eyes 'This is really stupid, you can't just keep her like a toy she's a person' Tali frowns (not that Miranda could see her) but it softens when she feels Jane nuzzle against her boob. She looks down at those big green eyes looking up at her with a wide grin and smiled in return.

So do Jane and Tali get to have their little time together alone, or does she decide to stay with Shepard by coming along with Miranda in showing her around?
1122121.title: Tali's reunion

"Hello, ___ are you here?" Shepard calls out to the member to see if she is here or not. With no reply, Shepard decides to look around a bit. He notices a strange gun that isn't military standard, in fact, it looks like something that he would normally see in testing facilities. Wanting to take a closer look, Shepard grabs the gun and examines it. Unfortunately, Shepard did not notice that the gun has a security system and began to glow. Not able to react in time, a bright light consumes Shepard. When Shepard gains his vison, he notices that he seems to be on a strange metal plain. However, he quickly realizes of just what happens to him when a saw a bolt the size of the Citadel standing in front of him. Shepard shrunk to a minuscule size, and it was going to be worse. Shepard notices an earthquake, shortly follow by another one, Shepard realize that these aren't earthquake, they were foot steps.

145212212.content: Hot Springs: Vax wakes up in the hot springs of Scanlan's magical mansion, floating on his back in the water. He is wondering what is going on when he sees the massive women of Vox Machina Vex, Keyleth, Pike, and Kima (she is considered a full member of the group and was invited into the hot springs for some girl time). They start to swim around in order to get to comfortable spots, accidentally bouncing Vax around with their bodies while doing so. This may end with him in Keyleth or Vex's cleavage, between Kima's butt cheeks, or being found by Pike and thus toyed with by the giant women.

14521222.content: The bisexual twin of Vax and the lover of Percy. She is very flirty and lewd and would likely use her new size to her advantage in bed.
14521222.title: Vex?

145212221.content: Study: Vex was going through any information she could on Orcus when after reading a particular phrase she shrinks and lands on her very comfortable chair. She tries to get off of it when she hears the door open and sees Zahra enter. She sees Vex, but decides to have some fun with her by pretending to sit on her. Before she does this, she tries to position her rear to land behind Vex, but she fails to realize that Vex was running to the back of the chair and was crushed under the center of her rear. Zahra feels this, but before she can get up she feels how nice Vex's struggles are underneath of her. She then decides to stay there for a while and study, quietly moving her butt around the chair.
145212221.title: Vex

1452122212.content:
Clasp: During the time-skip Vex went to make sure that everything was cool with the Clasp, an underground thieves guild. However, when she arrives she is hit by a dart that is covered in a shrinking toxin and passes out. When she wakes up she discovers that her clothes are missing and when she looks around she sees the giant forms of Dren and Devan, a pair of halfling lovers, and Delweth, an elvish trickster. These three are sick of Vox Machina messing with Clasp affairs and have decided to punish Vex for the groups transgressions.
Dren is a halfling assassin that really loves Devan, to the point of where she would do anything she asks. She would keep Vex around as a plaything for when she didn't have Devan to "play" with.
Devan is a halfling sorcerer that really only likes Dren for the sex. If she had Vex, she would probably keep her as a seat cushion or a snack if she couldn't feel bothered to get it herself.
Delweth is an elven trickster that only cares about herself and the Clasp. If she had Vex, she would keep her in her clothing all day to pleasure herself. She would also pleasure Vex as well, because an unhappy slave isn't an effective slave.
1452122212.title: Other

145212222.content: Kynan was a Vox Machina fan boy, but was turned away by Vax. When he showed up again he was fighting them. He is convinced to help them and is finally accepted by the group. Who will he be shrunken around?
145212222.title: Kynan?

1452122221.content:
Kynan was practicing his shooting skills in the courtyard when he is hit by a magical burst of energy. He then started to shrink down to around an inch tall on the center of the chair he was resting in. He stood up and immediately tried to figure out a way to get off of the chair. He immediately stopped when he saw the giant form of ___ enter the courtyard and move towards the chair that Kynan is located on.
Vax is a bisexual half-elf rogue that is in love with Keyleth. If he found Kynan, he would probably drop him into his pants until he got to a nice secluded place to have his fun.
1452122221.title: Kynan

14521222212.content: Keyleth: If she found Kynan, she would try to keep him safe until she got another member of Vox Machina, most likely Vex or Vax, as she is closer to both of them then the others. They would decide to play several games with Kynan and it gets very dangerous really quickly. Such as if he was forced to climb Keyleth, to tongue wrestle Vax only for Keyleth to start making out with him, or Vex making him dodge their falling butts.
14521222212.title: Keyleth

14521222221.content:
As Scanlan was laying in his bed, playing his flute, and thinking of all the beautiful women that he sees on a regular basis. As he was thinking this, he played a series of notes that released a magical burst of energy that made him go unconscious. When he woke up, he discovered that he was ________.
Floating in alcohol: Scanlan wakes and is immediately surprised by the amount of alcohol he is surrounded by. This doesn't last long as he sees that he is actually located in a giant cup and said cup belongs to Vex'ahlia. She sounds like she's talking to Keyleth and they both sound quite drunk. This means Scanlan has to try to get out on his own before he is swallowed.
Both Vex and Keyleth have the hots for each other and who knows what may happen if they keep drinking.
14521222221.title: Scanlan
